text: Aap kahiye kay kiya Allah kay siwa jo kay aasmanon aur zamin ka peda kerney wala hai aur jo kay khaney ko deta hai aur uss ko koi khaney ko nahi deta aur kissi ko mabood qarar doon aap farma dijiye kay mujh ko yeh hukum hua hai kay sab say pehlay mein islam qabool keroon aur tu mushrikeen mein say hergiz na hona
